title: Vibrator tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to generate a vibrator with your smartphone

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

Move the **vibration** components into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/vibrator/image.png)

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Timing/Timing.png) on the sidebar,

move the **delay** component
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Timing/delay-component.png)

and put the components as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/vibrator/blocks.png)

this is to turn on the vibration of your smartphone and then with a delay of 5 seconds to turn off the vibration of your smartphone.
